title: Trump Claims He and Microsoft Have a Solution for AI-Related Utility Price Spikes
full_text: Trump Claims He and Microsoft Have a Solution for AI-Related Utility Price Spikes. Is Microsoft… going to subsidize our utility bills?. President Donald Trump did what he does on Monday evening and posted to his social media app, this time about how Microsoft isnt going to cause our bills to spike by creating massive amounts of new e… [+3591 chars]
